Can I stake an unlimited amount of PBaaS chains?
Yes, you can stake an unlimited amount of PBaaS chains, thanks to the hybrid consensus algorithm used by Verus.

.
All these chains have the same consensus algorithm, 50% PoW, 50% PoS, so you can also stake an unlimited amount of PBaaS-chains.
